subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: John Thompson III got the best of his younger brother Ronny Thompson last night, guiding No. 18 Georgetown to a 69-54 victory against visiting Ball State in the first meeting between the coaching sons of John Thompson Jr.
snippet: John Thompson III got the best of his younger brother Ronny Thompson last night, guiding No. 18 Georgetown to a 69-54 victory against visiting Ball State in the first meeting between the coaching sons of John Thompson Jr.
